body: At 6th level, once per day, you may heal yourself as a swift action, healing 1d6 hit points for every two inquisitor levels you possess. When you use this ability, you can also remove one of the following conditions from yourself: blinded, confused, dazzled, deafened, frightened, nauseated, shaken, sickened, or staggered.
name: Inner Strength
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Inquisitor/Inquisitions/Persistence Inquisition/Granted Powers/Inner Strength
